sentences.sContent: You must be auxin, cause you are causing me to have rapid stem elongation.
sentences.sContent_eng: You must be auxin, cause you are causing me to have rapid stem elongation.
sentences.sCn: 你一定是生长素，因为你让我的茎迅速的延长。

sentences.sContent: Myopia (nearsightedness) is an abnormal elongation of the eye, causing distant objects to appear blurred.
sentences.sContent_eng: Myopia (nearsightedness) is an abnormal elongation of the eye, causing distant objects to appear blurred.
sentences.sCn: 近视是视力不正常的伸长，使远距离的物体模糊不清。

sentences.sContent: If little close work is done, this elongation process normally stops with only a slight amount of farsightedness left.
sentences.sContent_eng: If little close work is done, this elongation process normally stops with only a slight amount of farsightedness left.
sentences.sCn: 如果轻度的近距离工作，只要轻度的远视调节，这个伸长过程就可以正常停止。

synos.tran: 伸长；伸长率；延伸率；延长

phrases.pCn: 断裂伸长；断裂延伸率；破坏时伸长量
拉伸，拉伸伸长；延伸率，抗张伸展率
延伸率；伸长率；相对伸长

words.tran: 延长（elongate的过去分词）；把…拉长

trans.tranOther: the act of elongating or state of being elongated; lengthening
